name: bePOS
tagline: Super Point of Sale Platform - Increase your productivity and leverage your business!
description:
bePOS is a Vietnamese startup that empowers SMEs in Southeast Asia through a Super Point of Sale Platform.
Our mission are digitalize the merchants' business to increase their productivity and leverage their resources by providing them the Point of Sale data-related services.

Empowering 10,000 customer in 15+ countries.
